page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN UTTOXETER
page.content: 1 EMPLOYMENT PATTERN The largest single employer in Uttoxeter is Adams Foods Limited who manufacture a range of biscuits: 95% for UK, 5% for EEC and other overseas markets. The factory employs 850 people mainly women. Data from Uttoxeter employment exchange which extends beyond the Domesday Projects own grid square for the town,reveals that in 1983, for companies with 10 or more employees : Total employment= 3673 Male = 2415 or 65.7% Female = 1258 or 34.3% A sample of the employment pattern by activity and sex is as follows: ADAMS FOOD LTD: 360M , 490F STEVENSONS COACH & TRAVEL : 30M , 40F
